title: Extending CI/CD and GitOps for Better K8s App Deployments
author: Bhushan Nemade
description: Traditional CI/CD pipelines and GitOps aren’t scalable or flexible enough on their own to handle the pace of Kubernetes-based software delivery.
cntitle: 扩展CI/CD和GitOps以改进K8s应用部署
cndescription: 传统的 CI/CD 管道和 GitOps 本身缺乏足够的可扩展性和灵活性，无法应对基于 Kubernetes 的软件交付速度。
